name: Racing Car Win Deadly Trails
description:
Racing Car Win Deadly Trails is a thrilling and exciting super car racing simulation game. Be the best driver of some of the fastest cars on the road in a collection of some of the world's most exciting sports cars. This amazingly realistic racing car driving simulation game is packed full of super cool fast race cars and exciting, dynamic racing levels.
Features:
- ABS, TC and ESP simulation. You can also turn them off!
- Explore a detailed open world environment.
- Realistic car damage. Crash your car!
- Accurate physics.
- Control your car with a steering wheel, accelerometer or arrows
- Several different cameras.
